actions.text: Amendment (A001) in the nature of a substitute offered by the Committee on Resources.
On agreeing to the Resources amendment (A001) Agreed to without objection.

description: Amendment in the nature of a substitute extends the authorization for funding for mining institutes to promote environmentally responsible mining technology development for the recovery of minerals from the nation's seabed.
purpose: An amendment in the nature of a substitute consisting of the text of the bill as reported from the Committee on Resources.
